docs.snippet: President Donald Trump’s “wall” along the U.S.-Mexico border would be a series of fences and walls that would cost as much as $21.6 billion (£17.3 billion), and take more than three years to construct, based on a U.S. Depart...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump’s “wall” along the U.S.-Mexico border would be a series of fences and walls that would cost as much as $21.6 billion (£17.3 billion), and take more than three years to construct, based on a U.S. Department of Homeland Security internal report seen by Reuters on Thursday.

headline.main: Exclusive-Trump Border 'Wall' to Cost $21.6 Billion, Take 3.5 Years to Build: Internal Report
